member.summary: Class representing a BEncoded Dictionary

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.BEncoding.BEncodedDictionary.DecodeTorrent(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Special decoding method for torrent files. This mode will ensure the correct infohash is generated for torrents which contain dictionaries with misordered keys.

member.summary: Special decoding method for torrent files. This mode will ensure the correct infohash is generated for torrents which contain dictionaries with misordered keys.

member.name: P:MonoTorrent.GitInfoHelper.ClientVersion
member.summary: The current version of the client in the form "MO1234", which represents a version triplet of '1.2.34'.

member.name: F:MonoTorrent.GitInfoHelper.Version
member.summary: The full version of this library in the form 'A.B.C'. 'A' and 'B' are guaranteed to be 1 digit each. 'C' can be one or two digits.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Client.MainLoop.SwitchToThreadpool
member.summary: When is awaited the continuation will be executed on the threadpool. If you are already on a threadpool thread the continuation will execute synchronously.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Client.MainLoop.SwitchThread
member.summary: When is awaited the continuation will always be queued on the ThreadPool for execution. It will never execute synchronously.
